short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension to allow quick opening of patents in Patently.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Opens Patently for a selected patent identifier.

This solution allows you to quickly invoke a search for a selected patent identifier within Patently.

Select a patent identifier in text, then open the context menu and select 'Open xxx in Patently' from the menu. You can normally open the context menu by right-clicking. For example, selection of 'US7654321' and then 'Open "US7654321" Patently' from the context menu, opens a new tab to the case in Patently.

The extension should work for any webpage loaded after the initial installation of the extension, but does require javascript to be enabled.
